snippet.title: StormEdge - Official Gameplay Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay from StormEdge, an upcoming action-roguelite game where you have to balance your desire to use powerful skills with the risk of taking damage or putting yourself in a vulnerable position. In StormEdge, you will take the role of one of the bravest and talented mages who is forming the StormEdge – guild which aim is to stop the elemental storms and save the world. StormEdge is coming to PC and Nintendo Switch in 2023.

#GameTrailers #SoG
